subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: When Dodgers second baseman Justin Turner, who used to play for the Mets, found out Juan Uribe was traded, he told some former teammates to expect an ebullient veteran who loves to laugh as much as he loves to win.
snippet: When Dodgers second baseman Justin Turner, who used to play for the Mets, found out Juan Uribe was traded, he told some former teammates to expect an ebullient veteran who loves to laugh as much as he loves to win.
